about_the_game:
A Thanksgiving gift for all fans of classical puzzles – it’s a new Holiday Puzzle! Holiday Jigsaw Thanksgiving Day 2 has 500 high-quality photographs on the holiday of the harvest, the fall and relaxing leisure among family and friends.

Set a difficulty to suit you on each puzzle! Save your progress at any time! Convenient controls and a bunch of hints and tools to help make your play more comfortable. Playing a puzzle on your computer is just as fun and easy as playing it in on a tabletop!

The time has come to decorate the house, pick out a turkey and make tradiitonal dishes. 500 ideas for decor, treats and gifts – all this awaits you in Holiday Jigsaw Thanksgiving Day 2! It will help you amaze your close ones and have a great Thanksgiving Day!

Solve puzzles, see wondrous images, recognize the traditions of Thanksgiving Day and plan how to spend the holiday! This jigsaw game is your inspiration for an unforgettable family holiday, and it’s full of ideas for how to have a great time this fall!

- 500 high quality unique images
- well designed game-play: useful hints, sort tool and magnifying glass.
- optional game difficulty control makes your gameplay infinite
- custom styles of pieces with rotation
- save your game progress and come back to your puzzle at any time
- tasks and colorful trophies for those who love excitement
- pleasant and relaxing music
- a happy holiday atmosphere
- get 500 puzzles for one purchase. It’s a bargain!
detailed_description:
A Thanksgiving gift for all fans of classical puzzles – it’s a new Holiday Puzzle! Holiday Jigsaw Thanksgiving Day 2 has 500 high-quality photographs on the holiday of the harvest, the fall and relaxing leisure among family and friends.

Set a difficulty to suit you on each puzzle! Save your progress at any time! Convenient controls and a bunch of hints and tools to help make your play more comfortable. Playing a puzzle on your computer is just as fun and easy as playing it in on a tabletop!

The time has come to decorate the house, pick out a turkey and make tradiitonal dishes. 500 ideas for decor, treats and gifts – all this awaits you in Holiday Jigsaw Thanksgiving Day 2! It will help you amaze your close ones and have a great Thanksgiving Day!

Solve puzzles, see wondrous images, recognize the traditions of Thanksgiving Day and plan how to spend the holiday! This jigsaw game is your inspiration for an unforgettable family holiday, and it’s full of ideas for how to have a great time this fall!

name: Holiday Jigsaw Thanksgiving Day 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 x64
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 145 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 145 MB available space

short_description: Gobble-gobble! 500 high-quality photos! 500 ideas for a happy family harvest holiday in Holiday Jigsaw Thanksgiving Day 2!
